title: 08/12/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/12/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by a stacked guest list. World Series Champ Kevin Millar joins us from Iowa to set the scene from the Field of Dreams game between the Yankees and White Sox. The Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay calls in to discuss music memorabilia and the chances of an Andrew Luck return. And the World's fastest man, Usain Bolt chats with Dan about racing NFL WR Tyreek Hill in a 70 meter dash. Would he put up a medal?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by a stacked guest list. World Series Champ Kevin Millar joins us from Iowa to set the scene from the Field of Dreams game between the Yankees and White Sox. The Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay calls in to discuss music memorabilia and the chances of an Andrew Luck return. And the World's fastest man, Usain Bolt chats with Dan about racing NFL WR Tyreek Hill in a 70 meter dash. Would he put up a medal?
